modules.name: Four Track
modules.description: Four-track recorder with signal chain integration
modules.author: Move Anything

modules.name: Dexed
modules.description: 6-operator FM synthesizer (Dexed/MSFA) with .syx patch support
modules.author: Dexed/MSFA by google/asb2m10 (port: charlesvestal)
modules.requires: Optional additional .syx patch banks (place in module's banks/ folder)

modules.name: SF2 Synth
modules.description: SoundFont (.sf2) synthesizer using FluidLite
modules.author: FluidLite by Robin Lobel (port: charlesvestal)
modules.requires: .sf2 soundfont files (place in module's soundfonts/ folder)

modules.name: M8 LPP Emulator
modules.description: Novation Launchpad Pro emulation for Dirtywave M8
modules.author: bobbydigitales

modules.name: Mini-JV
modules.description: ROM-based PCM rompler emulator
modules.author: nukeykt/giulioz
modules.requires: ROM files (place in module's roms/ folder)

modules.name: OB-Xd
modules.description: Virtual analog synthesizer based on Oberheim OB-X
modules.author: reales

modules.name: CloudSeed
modules.description: Algorithmic reverb by Ghost Note Audio
modules.author: Ghost Note Audio

modules.name: TAPESCAM
modules.description: Tape saturation and degradation effect
modules.author: Charles Vestal

modules.name: PSX Verb
modules.description: PlayStation 1 SPU reverb emulation
modules.author: Charles Vestal

modules.name: TapeDelay
modules.description: Tape delay with flutter and tone shaping
modules.author: Charles Vestal

modules.name: Junologue Chorus
modules.description: Junologue Chorus - Juno-60 chorus emulation (I, I+II, II modes)
modules.author: Peter Allwin (port: charlesvestal)

modules.name: SID Control
modules.description: MIDI controller for SIDaster III synthesizer
modules.author: charlesvestal

modules.name: Braids
modules.description: Macro oscillator with 47 synthesis algorithms (Mutable Instruments)
modules.author: Emilie Gillet (port: charlesvestal)

modules.name: Hera
modules.description: Juno-60 emulation synthesizer with BBD chorus
modules.author: jpcima (port: charlesvestal)

modules.name: Surge XT
modules.description: Hybrid synthesizer - wavetable, FM, subtractive, and physical modeling with 600+ presets
modules.author: Surge Synth Team (port: charlesvestal)

modules.name: RaffoSynth
modules.description: Monophonic synthesizer with 4 oscillators and Moog ladder filter
modules.author: Nicolas Roulet, Julian Palladino (port: charlesvestal)

modules.name: Webstream
modules.description: Web audio search and streaming generator with bundled yt-dlp + ffmpeg runtime
modules.author: charlesvestal

modules.name: NAM
modules.description: Neural Amp Modeler - neural network guitar amp/effect emulation
modules.author: NeuralAudio by Mike Oliphant (port: charlesvestal)
modules.requires: .nam model files (free models at tonehunt.org and tone3000.com)

modules.name: Ducker
modules.description: MIDI-triggered sidechain ducker - classic pumping without an audio sidechain
modules.author: charlesvestal

modules.name: Radio Garden
modules.description: Browse and stream live radio from 200 cities worldwide via Radio Garden
modules.author: charlesvestal

modules.name: AirPlay
modules.description: AirPlay audio receiver - stream from iPhone, iPad, or Mac to Move's signal chain
modules.author: charlesvestal

modules.name: CLAP FX
modules.description: Host for CLAP audio effect plugins
modules.author: charlesvestal
modules.requires: .clap plugin files (place in module's plugins/ folder)

modules.name: Gate
modules.description: Noise gate and downward expander
modules.author: charlesvestal

modules.name: Custom MIDI Control
modules.description: Custom MIDI controller with 16 banks of configurable pads/knobs/buttons
modules.author: chaolue

modules.name: Chiptune
modules.description: NES 2A03 & Game Boy DMG chiptune synthesizer with 32 presets
modules.author: blargg (port: charlesvestal)
